@MrDrAzad

Inspiration

For my ROR project, I built an application that I designed forever ago, but didn’t have the knowledge to build. So I thought it was fitting that I build it for my final ROR Project!

It is an artwork sharing site, similar to dribbble, where a user can sign up and share what is inspiring them. So a user can add posts with title, image and description, and other users can vote and comment on submissions.

Visit Rails

Fun Facts

In the app, I let users create an account and login using email and password. Users will be able to post a fact, and the table view will instantly update. The update will also immediately occur if another user posts a new fact. For fun, I added a voting function to the app, so the funniest facts can receive the credit that they deserve.

Visit Swift

Prevailing Wins

To provide dragon boating opportunities, competitive and recreational for people of all ages and abilities. To continue introducing youth to the sport of dragon boating by supporting a youth team through coaching and competition.

Recruit new members of all ages by promoting the healthy lifestyle, through paddling and fitness training and acting as team ambassadors by assisting in community events. We value respect for individual abilities, supporting and encouraging each other, and always doing it with humour and camaraderie.

Visit Wordpress
